metadata.name: Odbcconf.EXE Suspicious DLL Location
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "odbcconf" where the path of the DLL being registered is located in a potentially suspicious location.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\odbcconf.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('odbcconf.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\programdata\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\registration\\crmlog')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\com\\dmp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\fxstmp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\microsoft\\crypto\\rsa\\machinekeys\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\spool\\drivers\\color\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\spool\\printers\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\spool\\servers\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\tasks_migrated\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\tasks\\microsoft\\windows\\synccenter\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\com\\dmp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\fxstmp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\tasks\\microsoft\\windows\\pla\\system\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\tasks\\microsoft\\windows\\synccenter\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\tasks\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\tracing\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of "odbcconf" where the path of the DLL being registered is located in a potentially suspicious location.
